longBusinessSummary: Shanthi Gears Limited engages in the design, manufacture, supply, and service of gears and gear boxes in India, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company provides helical and bevel helical, worm, extruder, and cooling tower gear boxes, as well as geared motors. It also offers gears and pinions; special gearboxes; and iron, iron castings, phosphor bronze, aluminum bronze, leaded bronze, and copper alloy castings. In addition, the company provides installation support, refurbishment, and on-site services. Its products are used in steel, cement, sugar, crane and material handling, power, paper, rubber and plastics, off-highway and mining, process, compressor, railway, textile, and aerospace applications. The company was founded in 1960 and is based in Coimbatore, India. Shanthi Gears Limited operates as a subsidiary of Tube Investments of India Limited.
